import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DailyGoalsForWeek=_ref=>{let{weekGoals,updateDailyGoal,toggleDailyGoalCompletion,selectedDay,setSelectedDay}=_ref;// Array of days of the week
